SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE
Wishlists/Templates

Manage settings for the user experience of the Wish List widget. The Wishlists/Templates module's API name is wl.

Display SKU
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.dspladdtlsku
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show the SKU for each product in a wish list. If Show Additional Info is TRUE, the SKU also displays in the Additional Info window opened from a product in the wish list. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Enabled
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.enabled
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Turn on wish lists for logged-in users. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Filter Effective Account
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.filteff
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Filter Information in the My Account Page by Effective Account
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Filter User
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.fltusr
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show data in the My Templates section of the My Account page only from wish list records where the User field matches the logged-in user. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE. To show data from wish lists where the Owner field matches the logged-in user, use FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Go to Cart
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.g2c
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Navigate to the Shopping Cart page immediately after clicking Add to Cart on a wish list. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Pagination
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.pgbl
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show pagination controls when viewing a wish list from the wish lists widget on the Home page. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Short Add Button
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.pkron
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show the Add to Wish List button for a product on the page. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Short Add to Cart
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.dspladdcart
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show a quantity field and an Add to Cart button for each product in a wish list. This setting applies to both the wish lists widget on the Home page and the My Templates section of the My Account page. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Short Availability
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.dsplavlb
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show the product's inventory availability, if applicable, when viewing a wish list from the My Templates section of the My Account page. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Short Description My Account
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.dsplshortdesc
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show the product's short description when viewing a wish list from the My Templates section of the My Account page. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show Additional Info
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.dspladdtinfo
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show an Additional Info link for a product when viewing a wish list from the wish lists widget on the Home page. The link opens a window that can include the product's short description and SKU. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show Pricing
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.dsplprc
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show product pricing when viewing a wish list. This setting applies to both the wish lists widget on the Home page and the My Templates section of the My Account page. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show Pricing My Account
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.dsplpricing
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show product pricing when viewing a wish list from the My Templates section of the My Account page. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show Short Description
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.dspladdtlshortdesc
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show the product's short description in the Additional Info window opened from a product in the wish list. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show Unit of Measure
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	wl.dspluom
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show the product's unit of measure when viewing a wish list from the wish lists widget on the Home page. Possible values: TRUE, FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
SEE ALSO
Allow a Buyer to Create a Wish List of Items for a Future Cart

title: Wishlists/Templates Settings
